definition: respectful deference, to make amorous advances towards
details:
noun
- respectful deference
= example: respectful deference
= synonyms: homage
- an area wholly or partly surrounded by walls or buildings
= example: an area wholly or partly surrounded by walls or buildings
= synonyms: courtyard
- a specially marked horizontal area within which a game is played
= example: a specially marked horizontal area within which a game is played
- a room in which a lawcourt sits
= example: a room in which a lawcourt sits
= synonyms: courtroom
- the residence of a sovereign or nobleman
= example: the residence of a sovereign or nobleman
- a tribunal that is presided over by a magistrate or by one or more judges who administer justice according to the laws
= synonyms: lawcourt, court of law, court of justice
- a hotel for motorists
= synonyms: motor hotel, motor inn, motor lodge, tourist court
- the sovereign and his advisers who are the governing power of a state
= synonyms: royal court
- the family and retinue of a sovereign or prince
= synonyms: royal court
- an assembly (including one or more judges) to conduct judicial business
= synonyms: judicature
verb
- to make amorous advances towards
= example: to make amorous advances towards
= synonyms: romance, solicit, woo
- to engage in social activities leading to marriage
= example: to engage in social activities leading to marriage
- to seek someone's favor
= synonyms: woo
